pages.title: Gem Dust
pages.text: Gem dust is an essential resource, to obtain it you'll need a bunch of $(l)$(2)Gems$() and an $(l)Anvil$().$(br2)Now drop your gems on the ground and $(l)let the anvil fall on them$().

pages.title: Salvaging Table
pages.text: $(br)Now that you have a bunch of gem dust you can use it to craft a $(6)$(t:Also used for other items)$(l)Salvaging table$().$(br2)$(br)A salvaging table allows you to get multiple gem dust per gem crushed.
